title: Fried Dumplings
ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Baking Powder, Salt, Butter, Milk, Cooking Oil
method:
2 cups all purpose flour.
2 tbsp sugar.
1 tbsp baking powder.
1 teaspoon salt.
2 tbsp butter.
1 cup milk - pour a little and kneed, repeat.
Let sit for 30 mins - 1 hr - will be smooth after.
Dust some flour on and roll in palm of hands.
Put balls in frying pot with medium heat.
Turn after 2-3 mins.

title: Jerk Chicken
ingredients: Chicken (any pieces), Dry Jerk Seasoning (Chief Brand) or any kind of your choice, salt, wet jerk seasoning, browning
method:
Season and Marinate for 2 hrs.
Preheat oven at 400 degrees fahrenheit. 
Put in chicken uncovered for 1hr 20mins.
Base chicken and flip chicken at 50mins.
Increase heat to 480 cook for 10-15 mins.
Check if both sides cooks, flip to original side to get more color for 5-10 mins.
Chop with knife.

title: Cornmeal Porridge
ingredients: water, coconut milk, fine yellow cornmeal, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground all-spice, sweetened condensed milk
method:
add 2 1/2 cups water and one can of coconut milk to a four-qt heavy-bottomed pot. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. 
add 1 cup cornmeal and 1 1/2 cup water to a large mixing cup and whisk until smooth.
Once the liquid in the pot begins to boil gently, whisk in the cornmeal mixture and continue to whisk for about 1 minute, ensuring there are no lumps. Reduce heat to low and cover with a tight-fitting lid.
Cook over low heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. When there are about 5 minutes left, stir in vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice.  
Remove from heat and stir in condensed milk to sweeten it.

title: Rice and Peas
ingredients: 2 cups or 1/2 pound Dried Kidney Beans, coconut milk , 1 whole green scotch bonnet pepper, 2 - 4pimento peppers (for flavor) cut in half, 3 -4 stalks of scallion & thyme, 4 gloves garlic chopped, chopped onion, 1 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp butter (optional), 2 tsp mix or all purpose/dry jerk seasoning, 1 tbsp brown sugar (optional), 3 1/2 cups parboiled rice ( or any rice), 1 & 1/2 cups of liquid for every 1 cup of rice ratio
method:
2 cups red kidney beans. 
few cups of water (to cover beans).
add chopped garlic.
allow to boil.

add 2 cups coco milk, 2 cups water.
stir, allow to boil.
cover under low heat.
cook for 40mins-1 hr or until beans fully cooked.
stir in between.

add scallion and thyme, whole scotch bonnet, chopped onions.
add salt, jerk seasoning, butter, sugar.
stir and cover for 10mins .

add rice and bring to a boil.
lower heat and steam for 20 mins.
